subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical monument is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and is situated in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में UNESCO विशासन के शीर्षक निर्मूलक मंदिर है?
explanation_en: The Hawa Mahal, also known as the Palace of Winds, is a famous monument located in Jaipur and recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The monument was built in 1799 by Maharaja Sawai Pratap Singh.

question_en: Which historical monument is known as Jantaron ka Mandir (जोंदिर)?
explanation_en: Amber Fort, also known as Hawa Mahal, is a famous monument located in Jaipur.
